description: Everhood 2 is a psychedelic rpg cross a rhythm game. Dodge notes sent by enemies and reflect those notes back to them.

v0.1.0.description:
# Installation
### Melonloader
*Melonloader is required to play with this mod.  However reinstalling it is not required on update.*

1. Download MelonLoader.Installer.exe from https://github.com/LavaGang/MelonLoader/releases/latest and run it.
2. Choose the automated tab, click the select button and browse to `Everhood 2.exe`.
    - You can find the folder in steam by finding the game in your library, right clicking it and choosing *Manage→Browse Local Files*.
    - If you click the bar at the top telling you your current folder, this will give you a path you can copy. If you paste that into the window popped up by **MelonLoader**, it will automatically go to the same folder.
3. The launcher will automatically default to the latest version. 
    - If the latest version is not working: **Untick Latest and select 0.6.6.**
4. Click install. Once finished run the game once.

### Mod Install

1.Download `ArchipelagoEverhood.zip`.
2. Head to the Muse Dash folder and open up `/mods/`.
3. Extract the contents of the .zip file into mods.
   - Ensure that `ArchipelagoEverhood.dll` and `Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.dll` are under `/mods/` and not within a sub folder.
4. Run the game. If a new button appears on the start screen the mod was installed correctly.
v0.1.0.title: v0.1.0

v0.1.1.description:
# Changes
Please note that this is an early release. Things can go wrong.
- The mirror in the intro will no longer give cosmetic items. 
- The follower in the inventory should hopefully no longer say archipelago lines.
- Archipelago text should always auto complete immediately, no matter what text speed.
- Various visual glitches with archipelago text should be cleaned up. If there is any more cases please bring attention to it.
- Various logs have been removed from showing up. It should be easier to spot actual issues.
- Archipelago Chat has been added to the melon loader console.

# Installation
### Melonloader
*Melonloader is required to play with this mod.  However reinstalling it is not required on update.*

1. Download MelonLoader.Installer.exe from https://github.com/LavaGang/MelonLoader/releases/latest and run it.
2. Choose the automated tab, click the select button and browse to `Everhood 2.exe`.
    - You can find the folder in steam by finding the game in your library, right clicking it and choosing *Manage→Browse Local Files*.
    - If you click the bar at the top telling you your current folder, this will give you a path you can copy. If you paste that into the window popped up by **MelonLoader**, it will automatically go to the same folder.
3. The launcher will automatically default to the latest version. 
    - If the latest version is not working: **Untick Latest and select 0.6.6.**
4. Click install. Once finished run the game once.

### Mod Install

1.Download `ArchipelagoEverhood.zip`.
2. Head to the Muse Dash folder and open up `/mods/`.
3. Extract the contents of the .zip file into mods.
   - Ensure that `ArchipelagoEverhood.dll` and `Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.dll` are under `/mods/` and not within a sub folder.
4. Run the game. If a new button appears on the start screen the mod was installed correctly.
v0.1.1.title: v0.1.1

v0.2.0.description:
# Changes
Please note that this is an early release. Things may require admin intervention to resolve. 
- Added Door Keys.
- Added support for checks for all doors in the first hub.
- Floor Green and Floor Pinecone are now properly supported.
- Added Soul Color starts. (Enforces a soul color.)
  - The questionnaire is now skipped.
- Added Dragon Power Gem Percentage. (Lets you customise how many are required to open the door.)
- Fixed Neon Forest Back tracking
- Fixed a couple item giving issues.
- If there is a desync on items, desynced ones are removed.
- Hillbert Hotel Elevator menu now supports the increased numbers of keys.

# Installation
### Melonloader
*Melonloader is required to play with this mod.  However reinstalling it is not required on update.*

1. Download MelonLoader.Installer.exe from https://github.com/LavaGang/MelonLoader/releases/latest and run it.
2. Choose the automated tab, click the select button and browse to `Everhood 2.exe`.
    - You can find the folder in steam by finding the game in your library, right clicking it and choosing *Manage→Browse Local Files*.
    - If you click the bar at the top telling you your current folder, this will give you a path you can copy. If you paste that into the window popped up by **MelonLoader**, it will automatically go to the same folder.
3. The launcher will automatically default to the latest version. 
    - If the latest version is not working: **Untick Latest and select 0.6.6.**
4. Click install. Once finished run the game once.

### Mod Install

1.Download `ArchipelagoEverhood.zip`.
2. Head to the Muse Dash folder and open up `/mods/`.
3. Extract the contents of the .zip file into mods.
   - Ensure that `ArchipelagoEverhood.dll` and `Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.dll` are under `/mods/` and not within a sub folder.
4. Run the game. If a new button appears on the start screen the mod was installed correctly.
v0.2.0.title: v0.2.0

v0.2.3.description:
# Changes
Please note that this is an early release. Things may require admin intervention to resolve. 
APWorld:
- Corrected the logic of the Hillbert Hotel keys when doork keys is enabled.

Mod:
- Changed the logic in how Hillbert Hotel gives keys and rewards so they can handle being done out of order better.
- Fixed giving additional Progressive Marzian Keys every reload of the save.
- Fixed reward text being blocked longer than it should be in some cases.
- Include `Newtonsoft.Json.dll` so that everyone can run the mod.

# Installation
### Melonloader
*Melonloader is required to play with this mod.  However reinstalling it is not required on update.*

1. Download MelonLoader.Installer.exe from https://github.com/LavaGang/MelonLoader/releases/latest and run it.

    - You can find the folder in steam by finding the game in your library, right clicking it and choosing *Manage→Browse Local Files*.
    - If you click the bar at the top telling you your current folder, this will give you a path you can copy. If you paste that into the window popped up by **MelonLoader**, it will automatically go to the same folder.
3. The launcher will automatically default to the latest version. 
    - If the latest version is not working: **Untick Latest and select 0.6.6.**
4. Click install. Once finished run the game once.

### Mod Install

1.Download `ArchipelagoEverhood.zip`.
2. Head to the Muse Dash folder and open up `/mods/`.
3. Extract the contents of the .zip file into mods.
   - Ensure that `ArchipelagoEverhood.dll` and `Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.dll` are under `/mods/` and not within a sub folder.
4. Run the game. If a new button appears on the start screen the mod was installed correctly.

v0.3.0.description:
# Changes
Please note that this is an pre-release. Things are not fully tested, softlocks and logic errors are likely, you may require admin intervention.
APWorld:
- Colorsanity added. 
- Changes to other areas of logic.

Mod:
- Colorsanity added.
- Fixed the following locations not giving their rewards correctly until restart: Gold Key, Pet Orange Cat, Pet Grey Cat, Pet Black Cat.
- Delayed door change in main hub by 1 more frame. Hopefully fixing Home Town's door when you have almost no doors.
- Movement is reset on load. Should fix character stuck issues.
- Fixed soul color being wrong for red in the internals.


# Installation
### Melonloader
*Melonloader is required to play with this mod.  However reinstalling it is not required on update.*

1. Download MelonLoader.Installer.exe from https://github.com/LavaGang/MelonLoader/releases/latest and run it.
2. Choose the automated tab, click the select button and browse to `Everhood 2.exe`.
    - You can find the folder in steam by finding the game in your library, right clicking it and choosing *Manage→Browse Local Files*.
    - If you click the bar at the top telling you your current folder, this will give you a path you can copy. If you paste that into the window popped up by **MelonLoader**, it will automatically go to the same folder.
3. The launcher will automatically default to the latest version. 
    - If the latest version is not working: **Untick Latest and select 0.6.6.**
4. Click install. Once finished run the game once.

### Mod Install

1.Download `ArchipelagoEverhood.zip`.
2. Head to the Muse Dash folder and open up `/mods/`.
3. Extract the contents of the .zip file into mods.
   - Ensure that `ArchipelagoEverhood.dll` and `Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.dll` are under `/mods/` and not within a sub folder.
4. Run the game. If a new button appears on the start screen the mod was installed correctly.
v0.3.0.title: v0.3.0

v0.3.1.description:
# Changes
Please note: Softlocks may occur when using the Hub Warp. If this happens please message on discord about when and where.

APWorld:
- Fixed chests not having colorsanity logic.
- Fixed a Dark Pirahna chest not including the proceeding battle.

Mod:
- Fixed items not being re-received after reloading a save.
- Fixed unlocking non-default cosmetics via the neon district.
- Fixed Raven Tutorial 2 not locking colors in colorsanity.

### Melonloader
